sources.title: Louy K: The Lawless Years (TV-1961) PAUL RICHARDSüçï JAMES GREGORY
sources.description:
It's Friday@PizzaFLIX 
Stars: Paul Richards, James Gregory, Carol Eve Rossen
Director: Allen H. Miner
Writers: Allen H. Miner, Barney Ruditsky (Memoirs)

The rise & fall of prohibition era Hoodlum Louis Kassoff, the alleged founding father of Organized Crime. Writer-Director Allen H. Miner presents this brutal tale as FACT, based on the Memoirs of Barney Ruditsky, commanding officer of NYC‚Äôs famed "Gangster Squad." Believe it or Not!

TRIVIA: This 5-episode arc is compiled from the TV crime series THE LAWLESS YEARS.
